graphIIP
Class Graph2D

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.event.WindowAdapter
      graphIIP.Graph2D
All Implemented Interfaces:
WindowFocusListener, WindowListener, WindowStateListener, EventListener
public class Graph2D
extends WindowAdapter

Graph2D lets users work with a graphic space for drawing 2D points and lines.

Version:
(Acad. year. 2015-16, 0.9)
Author:
(CC - BY - NC - SA. From, IIP - PRG - ETSINF - UPV. pmarques)

Constructor Detail

Graph2D

public Graph2D(double mX,
               double xX,
               double mY,
               double xY)
        throws ImagingOpException
Creates a Graph2D with real dimensions and default background color and title.

Parameters:
mX: - double. Minimum x-coordinate value, mX < xX.
xX: - double. Maximum x-coordinate value, mX < xX.
mY: - double. Minimum y-coordinate value, mY < xY.
xY: - double. Maximum y-coordinate value, mY < xY.
Throws:
ImagingOpException: - Whenever an atempt to build an incorrect Graph2D is made.
ImagingOpException

Graph2D

public Graph2D(double mX,
               double xX,
               double mY,
               double xY,
               Color bckCol,
               String t)
        throws ImagingOpException
Creates a Graph2D with real dimensions, bckCol color and t title.

Parameters:
mX: - double. Minimum x-coordinate value, mX < xX.
xX: - double. Maximum x-coordinate value, mX < xX.
mY: - double. Minimum y-coordinate value, mY < xY.
xY: - double. Maximum y-coordinate value, mY < xY.
bckColor: - Color. Background color.
t: - String. Title of the graph. window.
Throws:
ImagingOpException: - Whenever an atempt to build an incorrect Graph2D is made.
ImagingOpException
Method Detail

drawLine

public void drawLine(double x1,
                     double y1,
                     double x2,
                     double y2)
Draws a line between (x1,y1) and (x2,y2). Works in the real graphic space.

Parameters:
x1: - The abscise value of the first point.
y1: - The ordinate value of the first point.
x2: - The abscise value of the second point.
y2: - The ordinate value of the second point.

drawLine

public void drawLine(double x1,
                     double y1,
                     double x2,
                     double y2,
                     Color c,
                     int th)
Draws a line between (x1,y1) and (x2,y2) with Color c and th thickness. Works in the real graphic space.

Parameters:
x1: - The abscise value of the first point.
y1: - The ordinate value of the first point.
x2: - The abscise value of the second point.
y2: - The ordinate value of the second point.
c: - Color of the line.
th: - int, the thickness of the line.

drawPoint

public void drawPoint(double x,
                      double y)
Draws a point given its real (x,y) coordinates.

Parameters:
x: - The abscise value of the point.
y: - The ordinate value of the point.

drawPoint

public void drawPoint(double x,
                      double y,
                      Color c,
                      int th)
Draws a point with Color c and th thickness, given its real (x,y) coordinates.

Parameters:
x: - The abscise value of the point.
y: - The ordinate value of the point.
c: - Color of the point.
th: - int. The thickness of the point.

showAxes

Parameters:
boolean - opt: Axes will be drawn iff opt is true.

Parameters:

windowClosing

public void windowClosing(WindowEvent e)
Closing sequence whenever this graph window is closed. There is no necessity to be called by the user.

Specified by:
windowClosing in interface WindowListener
